name: Complex
desc: DNA-protein complex formed during the experiment.

options.name: RPitc1
options.desc: RNAP initial transcription complex capable of synthesizing transcripts of length 1

options.name: RPitc2
options.desc: RNAP initial transcription complex capable of synthesizing transcripts of length 2

name: Temperature
desc: Temperature at which experiment was performed.

options.name: Antibody
options.desc: Antibody surface attachement and complex immobilization

options.name: (none)
options.desc: No additives beyond standard imaging buffer were included during experimental observation

options.name: Heparin
options.desc: Heparin, a DNA competitor, was included in the imaging buffer during experimental observation to remove non-specifically bound RNAP-DNA complexes

options.name: Glycerol
options.desc: Glycerol was added to the imaging buffer to increase viscosity and reduce reaction rates

name: Repeat
desc: If the experimental conditions have been used before, what repeat is the current experiment?
